meanings.definition: The mucous membrane that covers the front of the eye and lines the inside of the eyelids.
meanings.sent1: The conjunctiva helps protect the eye from dust and debris.
meanings.sent2: When you have pink eye, the conjunctiva becomes red and irritated.
meanings.sent3: The conjunctiva decided to throw a party for the cornea and iris.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like the conjunctiva, always there to shield and support.
meanings.sent5: The conjunctiva, like a gentle blanket, enveloped the eye in comfort.
